item.title: Former IAS officer, who was Raichur DC, spotted as monk at Maha Kumbh Mela
item.description:
<![CDATA[AICHUR: Former IAS officer I R Perumal, who previously served as the Deputy Commissioner of Raichur, has been spotted as a monk at the Maha Kumbh Mela 2025 in Prayagraj.
A photo of the former IAS officer, now a monk with hair tied in a knot and a sacred thread, has gone viral. His life as an ascetic has come as a surprise to many.
Perumal served as the District Commissioner of Raichur from 1993-94 and later as the Secretary of the Youth Empowerment and Sports Department. He retired in 2012 aft...]]>
